attributes.action: save our Swindon central Post Office from relocation to inside a WHSmith store
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a proposal to relocate the main central Post Office in Swindon, currently at Sanford Street in the town centre, into a WHSmith branch in the nearby vicinity.

We the undersigned do not want this to happen as the quality of service will be severely compromised, access will be a problem for those with mobility needs, and so much money has been spent fitting out the current 'flagship' branch which only opened a short time ago.

The Post Office must re-think this short-sighted proposal.
